resources.string: This is the Arduino Motion app
This app will let you control the Arduino Motion module
To know more about the app press the "Learn More" button below
To know more about who made this app press the "About" button below
To go to the features page press "Next Page"
Here you will see the features menu where you can choose the interactions with the Arduino Motion module
If you press the Bluetooth button you will get a page where you can turn on you Bluetooth and connect to your Arduino module.
If you press the Notifications button you will get a page where you can select if you want Notifications enabled and choose what type of notifications you want.
This is the page where you can configure if you do or do not want notifications and which type of notifications you want to receive.
Here you can connect to your Arduino Motion module and configure it
